title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 43.13 - Applicability of prohibitions and violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 43.13 - Applicability of prohibitions and violations

State Regulations
(a) The provisions for prompt payment for
milk prescribed under section 258- b(2) of the law shall apply to both bulk and
packaged milk purchased or received by a milk dealer from a cooperative
corporation or associations of producers. (b) The prohibitions and violations relating
to the sale of milk by a milk dealer to another milk dealer pursuant to section
258-b(15) of the law shall apply to the sale of milk by a cooperative
corporation or association of producers to a milk dealer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
43.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
